Docs.param: The MicrosoftAppId of the bot sending the activity.
The MicrosoftAppId of the bot receiving the activity.
The URL of the bot receiving the activity.
The callback Url for the skill host.

Docs.summary: Forwards an activity to a skill (bot).
Docs.remarks: NOTE: Forwarding an activity to a skill will flush UserState and ConversationState changes so that skill has accurate state.
